metadata.title: Matty M Womens Soft Pants (X-Small, Black Solid)
description: 95% Rayon/5% Spandex Imported Hand wash cold with like colors. Inside out. Do not bleach. Lay flat to dry. Cool iron if needed. Do not dry clean. Soft jersey material Side slant pockets Tapered leg opening Pull-on style with ruched waistband
